0.title: CHINA, BUT NO BEACH

5.title: SURPRISE ME, TREBEK!
clues: If you order a pullet surprise in a restaurant, they'll serve you this type of meat

10.title: WOLF IT DOWN!

11.title: PEOPLE SEXIEST MAN ALIVE
